name: Cozy pumpking shop
description:
This is just a small pumpkin shop project, there is no goal other than to make pumpkins as close to the one ordered as possible.
We were Inspired by the cakes game in purble place.
Thanks for playing!

Credits:

Alec Acosta: Programming

Derc Ruichvez: Art, Music and SFX

Made for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam (2022), September 2022
